c74object.name: pnp.pitchshift~
c74object.description: pnp.pitchshift~ is a pitchshifter that uses an FFT to transpose an incoming signal using semi tones, where an increas by 1 is an transposition factor of 1 semitone. Setting negative values transposes the resulting pitch down. The object semitone argument defaults to 0 if unspecified.

inlet.digest: Semi-Tone Transposition where positive integers pitchshift higher and negative integers pitchshift lower

objarg.name: Transposition
objarg.digest: Sets the transposition amount in semi-tones

method.name: int
method.description: Converted to float. Numbers can be used to control parameter values. Any numbers sent to the left inlet will be ignored.
